column4: is there a way to change the ALT button to something else (like windows button)? i use a program which uses ALT a lot and ubuntu is always stopping me from using it
Check the keybindings in ccsm>Advanced Search after clicking on the Keyboard icon in the Filter box, if you're using unity or compiz
i dont see anything in key bindings
You go to ccsm>Advanced Search and click on the little keyboard icon in the filter box there
ok i found keybindings in the General settings
Then hit the keybinding and it will tell you if it's bound to a plugin
